name: WKInterfaceVolumeControl
desc: An interface element that provides control of the audio volume from the watch or a paired iPhone.

items.name: func setTintColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Sets the volume controlâ€™s tint color.

items.name: func focus()
items.desc: Sets the volume control as the focus for input from the Digital Crown.

items.name: func resignFocus()
items.desc: Removes focus from the volume control, causing it to stop receiving input from the Digital Crown.

items.name: init(origin: WKInterfaceVolumeControl.Origin)
items.desc: Creates a volume control for use in SwiftUI.

items.name: enum WKInterfaceVolumeControl.Origin
items.desc: The source of the audio managed by the volume control.
